questions: What is the best way to install ThamesThrive?
How to install ThamesThrive from docker image?
How to install ThamesThrive from source?
How to install ThamesThrive for production?
How to install ThamesThrive for staging server?
What are the different ways to install ThamesThrive?
answer:
# Installation types
There are basically 3 ways to install ThamesThrive:

* [From docker image](docker/index.md)
* [From source](source/index.md)
* [Production installation](production/index.md)
* [Staging server](staging/index.md)


!!! Tip

    If you encounter errors when installing ThamesThrive, see [trouble shooting section](../trouble/index.md)
